Mobile development with Flash and Flex is a new frontier, full of new adventures and discoveries. Recently I discovered something that might be useful to you. By default the mobile web browser on my Android 2.2 device scales a web page to make more room to display pages typically built for a desktop profile. This also turns off the two-finger / pinch zooming feature for the page (which is more important for content that hasn't been optimized for a mobile profile). I hope this is useful for those of you embarking on new adventures with Flash / Flex on mobile devices!
